abstract: A poster for “Exhibitionist” at the Saatchi Gallery — showing a bright pink tongue on the front of a pair of women’s underwear — has been banned from the subway system until adjustments can be made to make it less explicit.

headline.main: Ad for Rolling Stones Exhibition Banned from London Underground

snippet: A poster for “Exhibitionist” at the Saatchi Gallery — showing a bright pink tongue on the front of a pair of women’s underwear — has been banned from the subway system until adjustments can be made to make it less explicit.
